alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 2:55AM MST until February 23 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches above 5000 feet and 8 to 14 inches possible above 6500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Alpine, Buffalo Pass, Ganado, Pinetop- Lakeside, Show Low, Whiteriver and Window Rock. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will become very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow will cause areas of poor visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning and evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected to occur during the late morning and into the early evening. Additional snow forecast from 2 AM Today to 11 PM Today: Alpine 2 to 4 inches Buffalo Pass 6 to 10 inches Ganado 4 to 8 inches Pinetop-Lkside 6 to 10 inches Show Low 5 to 9 inches Whiteriver 1 to 3 inches Window Rock 3 to 5 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; White Mountains
